item.title: (R) Joyplots
item.description: German Zweites Juristisches Staatsexamen (2nd State Exam in Laws) is said to be tough. Let’s have a look at how hard it really is by visualising the distribution of grades from the Berlin 2017/IV campaign. The written part of the final exam consists of 7 handwritten 5-hour length cases…
